body:
- [x] 1. Create hidden v1.1 content:
  - [x] Create new .../v1.1/... directory on gh-pages #15987
    - [x] Create new .../v1.1/index.html (v1.1 doc banner) #15987
  - [x] Create new _includes/nav_v1.1.html file and add all topics into menu tree (navigation menu) #15903 
  - [x] Add drop-down version selector #16392
  - [x] Create and include a v1.0 banner: "This is an archived version of the documentation, the latest version is available here." #16163 
  - [x] Add "Disallow: /v1.0/" to existing [robot.txt](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/gh-pages/robots.txt) file (to hide the v1.0 content from web crawlers and focus SEO on new v1.1) #16388
- [x] 2. Run after all docs for v1.1 have been uploaded to gh-pages:
  - [x] Update existing [sitemap.xml](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/gh-pages/sitemap.xml) file (to pick up new v1.1 directory/doc set) [online tool](https://www.xml-sitemaps.com/index.php?errmsg=wr&initurl=%2F). #17126
    _Requirement_: All docs must be in the gh-pages branch (if something has not be uploaded yet, it wont get listed in the siteindex).  
    _Instructions_: Run the [online tool](https://www.xml-sitemaps.com/index.php?errmsg=wr&initurl=%2F) by specifying the [http://kubernetes.io/](http://kubernetes.io/) URL. Then put the new sitemap.xml file in the gh-pages branch by replacing this existing [sitemap.xml](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/gh-pages/sitemap.xml) file.
  - [x] Run "add sitemap" in [search console](https://www.google.com/webmasters/tools/sitemap-list?hl=en&siteUrl=http://kubernetes.io/#MAIN_TAB=0&CARD_TAB=-1). @brendandburns has access to this console.
- [x] 3. (#16416) Expose v1.1 content for GA (will open a single PR to be merged for GA): 
  - [x] Expose drop-down version selector in the existing v1.0 doc set #16416
  - [x] Expose v1.0 banner (archive notice and redirect to v1.1) #16416
  - [x] Update links (so site defaults to v1.1): Update 404 page, update "Documentation" in main site horizontal nav bar, and all links in "http://kubernetes.io/gettingstarted/" #16416
  - [ ] ~~Create/add files for redirecting v1.0 urls to v1.1 (do this to maintain SEO/analytics and avoid negative impacts of changing all our URLs) [how to: .htaccess](http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.0/howto/htaccess.html)~~  
    This is not possible - [GitHub pages does not support .htaccess.html files](https://help.github.com/articles/redirects-on-github-pages/). The alternative they provide requires that each individual page include an automatic redirect which requires updates to the scripts to update the Jekyll "frontmatter" and would have the negative affect of disallowing anyone to view the v1.0 content (they would always get redirected). We will have to leave this as is for now so that users have the choice of viewing either v1.0 or v1.1.

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to documentation.
labels.name: kind/documentation

labels.description: Highest priority. Must be actively worked on as someone's top priority right now.
labels.name: priority/critical-urgent

milestone.description:
Release 1.1.

P1 features:
* 250+ nodes, at our published SLO
* kube-proxy perf. improvements (via IPTables)
* Docker 1.8.x
* Horizontal pod auto-scaling
* Job
* Ingress
* Schema validation in kubectl
* Experimental API and API groups
* Graceful pod termination
milestone.title: v1.1

title: Create new v1.1 doc set in kubernetes.io
